advancements.aquamirae.root.title: アクアミラエ
advancements.aquamirae.find_ice_maze.des: 凍った海で氷の迷宮を見つける。
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_fin.title: ほとんど扇風機のように
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_anglers_fa: アンコウの牙を手に入れる
advancements.aquamirae.terrible_armor.de: 全ての酷い防具を手に入れる
全てのスリーボルトの防具を作る
advancements.aquamirae.abyssal_armor.des: 全ての深淵の防具を作る
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_shell_horn: 冷凍船探索中に重要なアイテムを見つける
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_frozen_key: 水辺でシェルホーンを使い、船長の幽霊から鍵を奪う。(なんて奴だ)
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_dagger_of_: 強欲な短剣を見つける
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_rune_of_th: 嵐のルーンを見つける
advancements.aquamirae.obtain_esca.title: 暗闇の中の光
魚介シチューを作って食べる
advancements.aquamirae.consume_poseidons: ポセイドンの朝食を作って食べる
advancements.aquamirae.catch_golden_moth: 光る蛾を瓶に捕まえる(多分蝶々ではない)
ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor_full_1: Full-Set Ability §8with Heaume > When you take fatal damage, your death is delayed for {#1}. You deal 80% less damage while the effect is active.
ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor_full_2: Full-Set Ability §8with Tiara > Blinds nearby hostile creatures, reducing their movement speed by 50%.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_1: Theft > Attacked Villagers and Pillagers drop emeralds.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_2: Punishment > Chance to get a Bad Omen when attacking Villagers.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_3: Unique Forging > Made by an Anciet Blacksmith and can't be repaired.
ability.aquamirae.divider: Cutting > Reduces the target's max health by 5% for {#1}. Stacks up to 10 times.
ability.aquamirae.fin_cutter: Revenge > For each empty heart you have, you deal {#1} more damage (max {#2}).
ability.aquamirae.maze_rose: Active Ability > Summons chakras for {#2}, dealing {#1} melee damage.
ability.aquamirae.poisoned_blade: Infection > The attacked enemy is poisoned for {#1}.
ability.aquamirae.poisoned_chakra: Active Ability > Summons chakras for {#2}, dealing {#1} damage and poisoning targets.
ability.aquamirae.remnants_saber: Adaptation > Deals {#1} more damage while in water.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor_full: Full-Set Ability > Enemies that attack you are Poisoned for {#1}.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor_half: Half-Set Ability > Taking damage in water increases your swimming speed by {#1} for {#2}.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_sword: Bloodthirsty Eye > You will take {#1} damage if the hit doesn't kill the enemy.
ability.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor_full: Full-Set Ability > Protects you from freezing in the waters of the Ice Maze.
ability.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor_half: Half-Set Ability > Works with helmet and suit only: the suit provides you with oxygen underwater.
ability.aquamirae.whisper_of_the_abyss: Perforation > Reduces the target's armor by 10% for {#1}. Stacks up to 5 times.
ability.aquamirae.coral_lance: Suppression > You deal {#1} more damage to Ship Graveyard creatures.
lore.aquamirae.frozen_key: 氷の迷路の奥深くに隠された宝箱を開ける。
lore.aquamirae.golden_moth_in_a_jar: 宝物の中には、自分の魂を持ち、他人を食い尽くすだけでなく......。
lore.aquamirae.luminescent_bubble: 近くのプレイヤーの泳ぐスピードを上げる。浮いている場所に海中道路を作る。
lore.aquamirae.pirate_pouch: {I}Press {U} to open. > 腐った牡蠣のような匂いのする忘れられた海賊服...。
lore.aquamirae.poseidons_breakfast: Food of the Sea Gods. > §9Fury X (3:00) > §9Rush V (3:00) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+100% Ability Power > §9+50% Cooldown Reduction
lore.aquamirae.rune_of_the_storm: {I}Press {U} to use. > オフハンドの剣に装着し、寒い所でのダメージを33%増加させる。
lore.aquamirae.dead_sea_scroll: {I}Press {U} to read. > §d何が起こるか不明
lore.aquamirae.sea_casserole: Is it looking at me? > §9Rush II (1:30) > §9Strength (0:30) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+20% Cooldown Reduction > §9+3 Attack Damage
lore.aquamirae.sea_stew: The power of the sea in your stomach! > §9Fury III (2:00) > §9Strength (2:00) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+30% Ability Power > §9+3 Attack Damage
lore.aquamirae.shell_horn: {B}§dボス、コーネリア船長の亡霊を召喚する > 氷の迷宮の水の近くで使う。
lore.aquamirae.ship_graveyard_echo: 耳を澄ませば、氷の迷路に迷い込んだ何百隻もの船の角笛が聞こえてくる......。
lore.aquamirae.treasure_pouch: {I}Press {U} to open. > かつては貴重な戦利品だったが、今は氷の下で無価値な装身具となっている...。船や前哨基地のマップが入っている場合がある。
lore.aquamirae.wisteria_niveis: 凍てつくような荒れ地の中でも、素晴らしい人生が現れる。置くことができる。

item.aquamirae.abyssal_heaume: 眩い深淵のヘルメット

item.aquamirae.terrible_chestplate: 酷いチェストプレート
item.aquamirae.three_bolt_helmet: スリーボルトヘルメット
item.aquamirae.three_bolt_leggings: スリーボルトレギンス
item.aquamirae.wisteria_niveis: ウィステリア・ニベリス
